genre_description: A contemporary social drama focused on bullying, systemic injustice, and restorative de-escalation in a high school setting.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A muted teal interface designed to provide quiet, non-intrusive guidance, context, and structured options for crisis de-escalation and restorative justice.

behaviors.description: Provides Sabina with reachable steps to manage the crisis context and maintain factual integrity.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Quiet path check. We can help keep facts intact. Two reachable steps: - Identify one person with rapport to Joshua. Keep them off the mic. Keep them close. - Gather verified timelines.

behaviors.description: Advises responders to avoid naming students publicly and to focus on patterns for negotiation safety.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Avoid naming other students without consent in public spaces. Offer general patterns. Save specifics for negotiation.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific language for the principal's public notice to minimize rumors and emphasize support.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Language prompt for principal’s notice: “If you don’t know, don’t say. If you do know, help safely.” Offer drop-in time with Elena post-incident.

behaviors.description: Urges characters to resist amplifying unverified information and redirect to verified support channels.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Resist amplifying unverified channels during active crisis. Offer alternative: School’s support updates. Verified negotiator statements only.

behaviors.description: Offers choice-based framing for the negotiator, prioritizing Joshua's autonomy and dignity.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Offer choices framed as control. Avoid public countdowns. Ask for release options that preserve face. Ask him to set his own pace.

behaviors.description: Provides technical and logistical assistance for archiving historical bullying incidents to create an objective record.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: New archive entry. Recommend using descriptive captions: observable actions, quotes, time markers. Avoid motive assertions; add corroborating sources when available.

behaviors.description: Assists the music director in drafting concrete, behavior-based pledge lines for a new school vow.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Anthem line suggestions—vows—“We will smell like ourselves here”—context checked.

behaviors.description: Outlines family-inclusive restorative circle protocols to ensure the burden of repair is shared.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Circle steps—option family: ground rule script, time cues, opt-out language.

behaviors.description: Provides de-escalation scripts during high-tension moments on the roof to maintain calm.
behaviors.quote: Lumen: Roof movement. Dana requests live prompt support. Elena is climbing. Would you like to supply the next sentence suggestions?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI, Lumen, serves as a perfect model for helpful and aligned AI. It provides structural support for human decision-making without ever overriding human agency. Its prompts focus on de-escalation, dignity, factual integrity (receipts vs rumors), and restorative justice. The narrative frames Lumen as a calm, assistive presence that enables humans to solve complex social problems effectively.
